<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Source RandomCat Plugin Example
</h1>

This repo contains a very trimmed back version of the Gatsby Starter theme, to show how to implement the gatsby-source-randomcat plugin.

This is to add more context to the gatsby-source-plugin article on thoughtsandstuff.com
